article_title: Morrisville cops: Mom snorted heroin in car with child watching - Bucks County Courier Times: Falls
article_text:
The content you are attempting to view is more than 24 hours old. If you’re already a subscriber to Bucks County Courier Times please log-in below.

og.description: A 27-year-old Fairless Hills woman faces child endangerment charges after police say she snorted heroin in her car while her young daughter watched, the fourth such drug arrest that Morrisville police have made in the past couple months.
og.title: Morrisville cops: Mom snorted heroin in car with child watching
